episode: I was content after taking a nice hot bath last night.  It felt so soothing.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was content after taking a nice warm bath last night.  It felt so soothing and relaxing.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like bliss, did you light some candles too?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: No, but I put some lavender in the tub with me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Lavender's calming scent must've enhanced the experience.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, it was so calming and relaxing.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You must've slept like a baby afterwards.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I did!  I started getting sleepy in the tub.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great that you unwound so completely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I got it from my own plants that I am growing at my house.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fresh from your garden, that's lovely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I cut off a few leaves and flowers from the plant and put it directly in the tub with me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so nice, a spa night at home.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: A free spa at home at that!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Best kind, no expense required!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I came up with the idea when learning about herbs.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Clever application of what you learned!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm not really into drying it or making oils or anything.  At least not yet.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe you'll explore that later, who knows?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Plus lavender grows again year after year.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A low-maintenance and renewable resource!
